nodes.text: The Super Battledroid Mk II was a variation of the B2 super battle droid deployed by the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. A more powerful version was the Super Battledroid Mk III.

The Super Battledroid Mk II first appeared in "Star Wars: Battlefront: Renegade Squadron", and later in "Star Wars Battlefront: Elite Squadron". It only appeared in the personalization editor, where CIS droid players could customize their appearance. Since the player can choose what they wish to equip themselves with, their equipment and weapons are unknown. Battle droid is spelt as one word in it's name.
